items.title: Pelican
items.description: Generate a pelican riding a bicycle

items.title: Floating Glass Cards 3D Parallax Timeline
items.description: Create a parallax timeline using floating glass cards. Glide smoothly through 3D space, bringing each milestone into sharp focus with a depth-of-field effect.

items.title: Origami Pie Chart Animation
items.description: Animate a pie chart unfolding like elegant origami petals. Use soft shadows and a pastel palette for a tactile, high-quality paper feel.

items.title: Prismatic Glass Title Reveal
items.description: Reveal the title through a prismatic glass distortion. Split the light into RGB channels briefly before the text crystallizes into a clean solid form.

items.title: Liquid Morph Transition
items.description: Create a liquid morph where the screen melts into a fluid shape and reshapes into the new slide. Keep the motion silky smooth and elegant.

items.title: Liquid Metal Morph Loop
items.description: Design a mesmerizing loop of liquid metal morphing in the center. Overlay the text "COMING SOON" in a bold font that interacts with the metallic reflection.

items.title: Bubble Bullet Points
items.description: Animate bullet points floating up like bubbles in water. Use a gentle ease-out motion and a subtle transparency effect for a light, airy feel.

items.title: Breathing Gradient Sphere
items.description: Render a gradient sphere slowly breathing and changing colors like a sunset. Float the word "CALM" in the center with a soft blur effect.

items.title: 动态柱状图
items.description: 动态柱状图，数据可视化

items.title: 路径字幕
items.description: 文字沿优雅图片边缘灵动飞舞，为画面注入生命力
